system.powerDescription: When a scene starts, you may use this power to play a track from your playlist. Decide if the track is Melancholy, Chill, or Angsty. Gain a bonus based on the tracks’ type for the rest of the scene. • Melancholy: You or any ally relieve 1 stress when they fail a roll. • Angst: After you or an ally gains an injury, hook, or affliction, they gain +1D on their next action. • Chill: At the end of the scene, everyone in short range of you recovers 1 stress if there was no risky or hard rolls made this scene.
